name: The Strawman Augment
description:
Made as a part of the monthly MAGS challenge through the Adventure Game Studio community, "The Strawman Augment" was made over the course of November 2018.

The theme for the month was "Scarecrow"

I decided to go full pants-on-head crazy so bring out your "Aliens" memes.

Story:

"While on a relaxing cruise of the galaxy, you break down on a backwater world. To repair your ship, you will have to use a nanomachine controlled body to explore the world and gather the materials needed to leave this backwater dirtball."

Known Issues:

I ran out of time for the contest, so I ended up using the default two-click GUI that's built into AGS... and it looks a little funky. If I do a future build I hope to fix it.

Download and unzip file in a directory to play
